entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 10:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 late this evening then light before morning. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then periods of snow mixed with rain. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 6 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to 6 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
